title: Blood is life
creator_contributor_role: Great Britain. Ministry of Health, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Blood

description: Illustrates the work of Britain's National Blood Transfusion Service. Shows how highly-trained personnel safeguard the health of donors and patients, by scrupulous care of equipment and checking of records. Describes the care with which blood is classified and stored, and how it finally reaches the patient in the operating theatre.
